abstract: In Sunday night's episode of "The Good Wife," Will lets slip a "Love you" to Alicia but he's also facing temptation.
snippet: In Sunday night's episode of "The Good Wife," Will lets slip a "Love you" to Alicia but he's also facing temptation.
lead_paragraph: If you spend any time on "Good Wife" fan forums, you know that the Willicia-shippers have been having a hard time this season. It's difficult to be optimistic about, let alone worship, the love of Will and Alicia when Alicia says in Episode 3 that she doesn't love Will.
